mapper.select: SELECT bc.*, users.nickname FROM board_comment AS bc INNER JOIN users AS users ON users.seq = bc.user_seq WHERE bc.board_seq = #{seq} AND bc.delete_yn = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_comment ( user_seq, content, create_dt, board_seq ) VALUES ( #{user_seq}, #{content}, CURRENT_TIME(), #{seq} )
mapper.update: UPDATE board_comment SET content = #{content}, update_dt = CURRENT_TIME() WHERE seq = #{seq}
UPDATE board_comment SET delete_yn = 'Y', delete_dt = CURRENT_TIME() WHERE seq = #{seq}
